DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: The yes/no response regarding whether the person responding to the question is the caregiver (the primary person in charge of care of a patient, usually a family member or a designated health care professional) for the patient enrolled in the clinical trial.

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Patient Dementia Cognitive Disability Eligibility Determination Indicator
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: The yes/no response regarding whether a patient enrolling on a clinical trial has an acquired organic mental disorder with loss of intellectual abilities of sufficient severity to interfere with social or occupational functioning OR has a dysfunction that is multifaceted and involves memory, behavior, personality, judgment, attention, spatial relations, language, abstract thought, and other executive functions that meets the criteria for participation in a clinical trial.

DataElementQueryResults.preferredName: Patient Substance Abuse Eligibility Determination Yes No Indicator
DataElementQueryResults.preferredDefinition: The yes/no response regarding whether a person enrolling in a clinical trial has developed a maladaptive pattern of drug or alcohol use that may lead to social, occupational, psychological, or physical problems meeting the criteria for enrollment.
The yes/no response regarding whether the person shares a residence with the patient enrolled in a clinical trial.
